quote: To her credit, though, Trace didn't lose her famous temper, not at that moment. At eighteen she was already expert at the older woman's art of fermenting rage, conserving it, for later use.
quote_letters: TO HER CREDIT THOUGH TRACE DIDNT LOSE HER FAMOUS TEMPER NOT AT THAT MOMENT AT EIGHTEEN SHE WAS ALREADY EXPERT AT THE OLDER WOMANS ART OF FERMENTING RAGE CONSERVING IT FOR LATER USE
